page.title: 07The Lifestyle of the People
page.content: The people of Butley are appreciative of good fortune in living in peaceful surroundings and generally very happy with their lot. There are clubs and activities in the village for those who want to join them, and Woodbridge beckons invitingly those whose sights are set further afield. The majority of families have private transport of some kind which is just as well. The post office stores, chapel and village school are now houses and it is proposed that the Middle School, equipped for over three hundred children will also close. The village people's main complaint is that there are too many holiday homes leading to a reduction of facilities for the local populace. SOCIAL LIFE: Butley 45 Other Villages 13 Woodbridge 6 Beyond 8
